data.text: An unhappy sputtering noise from the locomotive informs you that the fuel tanks have run dry. In moments, the engine cuts out and the power dies. The train coasts for a good distance further, but it does eventually roll to a stop in the middle of nowhere. Distant clicking noises pierce into the carriages.
You have no hope of reaching ASCENSION now. Your journey is over; you have failed. All that remains is to see whether the sun or the monsters will kill you first.
